content.text: The major shareholders of Arvinas Inc include institutional investors and insiders. As of the latest available data, the top institutional shareholders are BlackRock, Vanguard Group, and Fidelity Management & Research Company. These institutions hold a significant percentage of the total shares outstanding.

BlackRock is the largest institutional investor in Arvinas Inc, owning approximately 15% of the total shares outstanding. The Vanguard Group holds around 10% of the shares, while Fidelity Management & Research Company owns about 8%. Other notable institutional investors include State Street Corporation, Wellington Management Company, and T. Rowe Price Associates.

Insiders, including directors and executives of Arvinas Inc, also hold a notable percentage of the company's shares. The insider ownership is around 5%, indicating that the management team has a significant stake in the company's success. This aligns their interests with those of the shareholders.

Arvinas Inc has a diversified ownership structure with significant institutional investor participation. The major shareholders are BlackRock, Vanguard Group, and Fidelity Management & Research Company. The management team and other insiders hold a notable stake in the company, demonstrating their commitment to its success.

news.headline: Arvinas to Host Conference Call and Webcast to Discuss Vepdegestrant (ARV-471) Data Presented at 2023 San Antonio Breast Cancer Symposium and Plans to Expand Vepdegestrant Development Program
news.summary: NEW HAVEN, Conn., Dec. 05, 2023 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Arvinas, Inc. (Nasdaq: ARVN), a clinical-stage biotechnology company creating a new class of drugs based on targeted protein degradation, today announced that a conference call and webcast will be held with executives from Arvinas and Pfizer Inc. (NYSE: PFE) to discuss vepdegestrant (ARV-471) data presented at the 2023 San Antonio Breast Cancer Symposium (SABCS) as well as plans to expand the vepdegestrant development program. news.headline: Arvinas and Pfizer Announce Interim Data from Phase 1b Trial of Vepdegestrant in Combination with Palbociclib (IBRANCE®) and Plans to Expand Vepdegestrant Development Program

news.headline: Does Arvinas, Inc. (ARVN) Have the Potential to Rally 145.52% as Wall Street Analysts Expect?
news.summary: The average of price targets set by Wall Street analysts indicates a potential upside of 145.5% in Arvinas, Inc. (ARVN). While the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric is questionable, the positive trend in earnings estimate revisions might translate into an upside in the stock.
